name: Nirva
headline: Evidence-based Traditional and Complementary Medicine brand
description:
Nirva is an evidence-based, traditional and complementary medicine (T&CM) brand offering treatment programs for chronic conditions in the US and the UK.
Our approach combines natural, holistic, side-effect-free methods, including personalized diets, one-on-one yoga, health coaching, and supplements designed by experts trained in traditional and modern medicine.
generated_description:
Nirva is an innovative brand focused on evidence-based Traditional and Complementary Medicine (T&CM), launched in 2021 as part of Y Combinator Batch W21. With a dedicated team of ten based in London, Nirva is carving out a niche where ancient wisdom meets modern health practices, offering personalized treatment programs primarily for chronic conditions in the US and the UK.

At the heart of Nirva's mission is a blend of natural, holistic methods designed to be side-effect-free. They emphasize personalized health solutions that incorporate custom diets, one-on-one yoga sessions, health coaching, and expertly formulated supplements. The brand's services include exclusive bootcamps, online yoga classes, and wellness workshops, all aimed at improving life quality through natural and therapeutic practices.

Nirva’s approach to health is genuinely transformative. It provides not just a treatment plan but a comprehensive journey toward wellness. Their programs are designed to help manage various health concerns—from menopause to autoimmune conditions—backed by expert practitioners in Ayurveda and Yoga. 

Nirva has shown promising results, with 98% of participants reporting improvements in their health and quality of life within just three months of following their personalized plans. The use of technology, facilitated by their proprietary Nirva app, helps clients stay connected with health coaches and track their progress in real-time.

With Gustaf Alstromer as a Group Partner, Nirva is well-positioned in the consumer health services space and offers an attractive proposition for those seeking a holistic, personalized path to health. Dive into their world of wellness at [Nirva Health](https://nirvahealth.com).
